===Commands===
  * <a name="StartNow" />Start Now
    It starts GPS Logging immediately.
  * <a name="Start" />Start
    It starts GPS Logging immediately.

===Keyboard shortcuts(Numeric)===
  * 1 - [Commands#StartNow Start Now(NMEA/GPX/KML)]
  * 2 - [Commands#Start Start Now(NMEA/GPX/KML)]
  * 3 - Pause/Resume/Stop
  * * - Lock keypad
  * 0 - Record
  * # - Tool
